website_summaries.verdict: An overwhelming number of buyers are impressed with the comfortable and stylish New Balance 501. Those who move around a lot note how light the pair is, sparing their feet from the pains of too much movement.The NB 501 does not disappoint many of its loyal followers. Given its relative affordability, it surely will not hurt to try on and buy the New Balance 501 low-top shoes.
pros: Many wearers report that the New Balance 501 shoes run true to size
Several fashion-conscious purchasers of the heritage sneaker love its silhouette
Many of the purchasers take note of the lightweight feel of these retro running shoes
Some love how comfortable these low-top shoes feel even after long walks
Several shoe enthusiasts love the fact that there are a lot of colors to choose from the New Balance 501 collection
A lot of users are happy with how much value they get even with the New Balance 501’s affordable price
The suede and mesh upper of the shoe offers breathable coverage and extra ventilation for the feet, others have noted
There is adequate padding in the ankle collar and tongue for a plush in-shoe feel, others say
The projecting lugs on the outsole of the New Balance 501 shoes easily make it a versatile sneaker where surfaces are concerned, some have noticed
Some commend the vintage running sneaker’s reliable arch support and remarkable stability for a classic sneaker
cons: A few disappointed purchasers notice how the padding of the New Balance 501 sneaker does not last long
Quite a few people comment on how craftsmanship was not so excellent on the pair they have received
There are quality inconsistencies across items, according to a few NB 501 reviews

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive feet, and you need to wear soft sole shoes, this is not the right choice. The sole is very stiff! Arch support is not that good. The outer sole is pretty slippery, especially if surface is flat (such as tiles) and a bit moist. for better support they need to make a bit wider the outer sole in the middle of the shoe New Balance Men's 501v1 Sneaker
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable and stylish Dad-shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like these. They are a little wide and kind of stubby, as all New Balance shoes are. But that just means that you can walk in them all day without getting sore feet. They are definitely the most comfortable sneakers I own. There is a reason every dad in existence has a few pairs of NBs in the closet, they are just ultra comfy. But you can get them in a color besides white so you have the foot comfort of a dad without looking like one!
customer_reviews.author: maddriver

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these! He wears 10.5w, thats what I ordered, and they fit just right! We have had a hard time with sneaker lately because many styles have the attached tongue so they are really hard to get on his wide feet. This black pair looks sleek and stylish and he says they are really comfortable and fit true to size for him. For reference, he wears 10.5w in Cole Haan and Rockport, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Hutt

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's 501v1 Sneaker
product_meta.description: The 501 heritage sneaker features an athletic-inspired profile with a Ripple bottom for an eye-catching appearance coupled with superior traction. The classic-meets-modern look pairs equally well with denim and your favorite athleisure.
